name: Decision Economic Optimizer
description: Deterministic goal-based LLM model suggestion API with HTTP 402 USDC payments and outcome credits (discounts).

DECISION_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the Whichâ€‘LLM API (e.g. https://api.which-llm.com).

DECISION_PREFERRED_CHAIN.description: Preferred CAIP-2 chain id for payments (e.g. eip155:8453 for Base).

DECISION_CREDIT_TOKEN.description: Optional credit token to apply as X-Credit-Token (discount) on paid calls.

endpoints.summary: Suggest a recommended LLM model under cost/quality constraints and return a fallback plan.
Report what happened; if the original decision was verified, returns a credit token (discount).

payment.security_note: Only the resulting transaction hash and payer address are provided to the agent as public proof of payment. The API verifies payments on-chain.

redeem.effect: reduces required_amount on the next paid call
